column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " Two lobster crabs , please . "
#Text=Fishmonger says : " Why , you 're the Avatar , ai n'tcha ? "
#Text=Korra says : " Yup , that 's me . "
#Text=Fishmonger says : " I ca n't believe it !
#Text=" Korra says : " Well , uhm , I 'm kind of in a hurry .
#Text=" Fishmonger says : " I - it 'll only take a second !
#Text=Avatar Aang was a big fan of my seaweed wraps , you know , so , I named 'em " Aang Rolls " !
#Text=Now they 're my biggest seller !
#Text=And they ai n't even got fish in 'em !
#Text=Now , smile !
#Text=" Fishmonger says : " But if I coulda met any Avatar , I 'd have to pick Kyoshi .
#Text=Taking down a shark squid with one hand !
#Text=Now that 's a lady I 'd like to get to know !
#Text=" Vendor says : " Thieves !
#Text=Get back here !
#Text=" Fishmonger says : " Oh , do n't worry , the Avatar 's right here !
#Text=Well , what are you waiting for ?
#Text=Go get 'em !
#Text=" Korra says : " Hand over the bags or else .
#Text=" Vendor says : " You sure she 's the Avatar ?
#Text="
